articles.author: Yagya Sharma
articles.title: Meet Surekha Yadav, Asia's first woman loco pilot who now operates Vande Bharat - Hindustan Times
articles.description: She expressed gratitude for being given the chance to operate the Vande Bharat Train. "She was thankful for giving her the opportunity to pilot the new age, state-of-the-art technology Vande Bharat Train. The train departed Solapur at right time and reached C…
articles.content: Surekha Yadav, Asia's first woman loco pilot, has now become the first female to operate the newly-introduced semi-high speed Vande Bharat Express train, the Central Railways said. On Monday, she ach… [+1534 chars]

articles.author: Yusuke Tamiyama, Yusuke Tamiyama
articles.title: Japanese astronaut Koichi Wakata back from space after an ISS mission - asianews.network
articles.description: Wakata and his crewmates from the United States and Russia had been on the ISS for an extended stay since October. This was Wakata’s fourth time on the space station.
articles.content:
March 14, 2023
TOKYO Astronaut Koichi Wakata of the Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA) returned to Earth on Saturday with three crewmates from the International Space Station (ISS).
